protocol.name: P-GSE54676-1
protocol.text: MAS 5.0 ID_REF =  VALUE = log2 MAS 5.0 signal

protocol.name: P-GSE54676-2
protocol.text: After two weeks, seedlings were transferred to half-strength liquid MS medium containing 10 μM β-estradiol (treatment) or 0.1% ethanol (mock) for 5 h. Subsequently, seedlings were harvested at 1 h, 2 h and 5 h after estradiol addition. In the case of mature leaves, after 2 weeks of growth in soil, opposing leaves of a whorl were excised and incubated in half-strength liquid MS medium containing 10 μM estradiol (treatment) or 0.1% ethanol (mock) for 5 h.

protocol.name: P-GSE54676-3
protocol.text: Seeds were surface-sterilized for 1 min in 70% ethanol and then in sterilisation solution (20% sodium hypochlorite) for 30 min. After sterilization, the seeds were sown on half-strength MS medium (Murashige and Skoog, 1962), supplemented with 1% (w/v) sucrose and hygromycin, and solidified with 0.7% (w/v) phytoagar. After imbibition, the seeds were stratified at 4°C for 3 days. The seeds were germinated at 22°C under a 16-h day (140 µmol m-2 s-1) / 8-h night regime. The two-week-old Arabidopsis seedlings were carefully removed from plates and subjected to EST or mock treatments for 1 h, 2 h and 5 h.

protocol.name: P-GSE54676-5
protocol.text: Labelling, hybridisation, washing, staining, and scanning procedures were performed by an Affymetrix authorized service provider (ATLAS Biolabs, Berlin, Germany) as described in the Affymetrix technical manual

protocol.name: P-GSE54676-8
protocol.text: The two-week-old Arabidopsis seedlings were carefully transferred from plates to pots in a growth chamber with a 16-h day (120 μmol m-2 s-1) and a day/night temperature of 22/16°C and 60/75% RH. The plants were allowed to grow for 2 weeks.
